sentences.sContent: "You won't get away with this," he said with unexpected bravado.
sentences.sCn: “你逃脱不了的,”他带着出人意料的假自信说道。

remMethod.val: 来自bravo (vt. 欢呼； 喝彩)

trans.tranCn: 虚张声势， 装作有自信的样子
trans.tranOther: Bravado is an appearance of courage or confidence that someone shows in order to impress other people
